pullrequest.title: aws scripts and src commands related to field computer

content.raw:
ok, I believe this is now ready to be reviewed / merged .   The PRs at widgets and portal were already merged.

FYI: The simulator instance is also locally storing the state.log in ~/code/gazebo-logs 

@iche033 @chapulina could you please take a look  ?

The current AMIs are using this branch. So we will need to create new amis that pull from default.
